channel.title: Non League Football Show
channel.description: For the fans, by the fans; a non-League football show with the best guests and latest news from the world of grassroots football.
channel.itunes:summary: For the fans, by the fans; a non-League football show with the best guests and latest news from the world of grassroots football.
channel.itunes:author: BBC London
channel.itunes:keywords: Non league, nonleague, football, grassroots footie, nonleague football, football clubs, bbc, sport, caroline barker, non league today, blue square, conference, grassroots,

item.title: NonLeague: Season 5 Episode 43
item.description: The latest on Darlington and league restructuring as we hear from both sides, the club and the FA. Plus we bid a fond farewell to Simon up North.. but hopefully not for too long!
item.itunes:subtitle: The latest on Darlington and league restructuring as we hear from both sides, the club and the FA. Plus we bid a fond farewell to Simon up North.. but hopefully not for too long!...
item.itunes:summary: The latest on Darlington and league restructuring as we hear from both sides, the club and the FA. Plus we bid a fond farewell to Simon up North.. but hopefully not for too long!
item.itunes:author: BBC London

item.title: NonLeague: Season 5: Episode 42
item.description: The new Macclesfield boss Steve King joins us in the studio as we talk promotion with the York Manager Gary Mills and what next for Luton with Gary Sweet. There's a visit to Celtic, some wrong names and plenty more besides on the home of Non League football.
item.itunes:subtitle: The new Macclesfield boss Steve King joins us in the studio as we talk promotion with the York Manager Gary Mills and what next for Luton with Gary Sweet. There's a visit to Celtic, some wrong names and plenty more besides on the home of Non League...

item.title: NonLeague: Season 5: Episode 41
item.description: We talk to the promotion boys at Dartford and Nuneaton as they secure their place in the Conference Premier. We catch up with Guernsey and a quick low down on the latest changes to the Non League pyramid.
item.itunes:subtitle: We talk to the promotion boys at Dartford and Nuneaton as they secure their place in the Conference Premier. We catch up with Guernsey and a quick low down on the latest changes to the Non League pyramid....
